contentrichtext.text: :''For the village in Khachmaz Rayon, see [[Zeyxuroba]].'' {{coord|39|45|27|N|47|01|53|E|display=title}} {{Infobox settlement |official_name =Xanoba |native_name = |pushpin_map =Azerbaijan |pushpin_mapsize =300 |coordinates_region = AZ |subdivision_type = Country |subdivision_name = {{flag|Azerbaijan}} |subdivision_type1 = [[Administrative divisions of Azerbaijan|Rayon]] |subdivision_name1 =[[Khojavend Rayon|Khojavend]] |leader_title = |leader_name = |established_title = |established_date = |area_total_km2 = |area_footnotes = |population_as_of = |population_total = |population_density_km2 = |timezone =[[Azerbaijan Time|AZT]] |utc_offset = +4 |timezone_DST =[[Azerbaijan Time|AZT]] |utc_offset_DST = +5 |latd=39 |latm=45 |lats=27 |latNS=N |longd=47|longm=01 |longs=53 |longEW=E |elevation_m = |area_code = |website = }} '''Xanoba''' is a village in the [[Khojavend Rayon]] of [[Azerbaijan]]. == References == *{{GEOnet2|32FA8852F4953774E0440003BA962ED3}} {{Khojavend Rayon}} [[Category:Populated places in Khojavend District]] {{Khojavend-geo-stub}}
